item.title: Build wxPython on Ubuntu 20.04 on raspberry pi 4
item.description: # Overview When I tried to run a Python app on ubuntu 20.04 on raspberry pi 4, I was angry that there was no wx. When I wonder what wx is, it’s wxPython. So I installed wxPython. What you did There is no corresponding package for pip itself, and the build from the source code of the wxPython main site did not work either. [This site](https://krhb.hatenablog.com/entry/2019/04/30/234953#ImportError-No-module-named-wx%E3%81%AE%E3%82%A8%E3%83Themethodintroducedin(A9%E3%83%BC) was helpful. Techniques introduced
